# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version       | Supported          |
|---------------|--------------------|
| v3.22.04.6235 | :white_check_mark: |
| v3.22.04.6230 | :white_check_mark: |
| < v3          | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

Make a issue, with `[Security]` title.
